reviews.text:
A must try will be the oysters, surprisingly fresh and amazing ! The sashimis are super fresh and a must try here ! The tuna seared in the edges just breaks down in your mouth !
If you're looking for a good sushi place. This is a must try !

Excellent Japanese eatery. Did a walk in on a Friday evening and the main restaurant area is full. Got ushered to the sister restaurant Kome Bar, which is empty. Ordered the food from Modern Izakaya and got served at Kome Bar which odd very quiet and nice environment. The waitresses were very attentive and prompt, excellent services.

The food were delicious and very well marinated and cooked, especially the stingray, chicken skin, chicken and pork meat. The beer was 1-1 before 8pm. Overall excellent place for Japanese food!

Lots of food selection, we had the 5+1 oysters for 30 dollars theyâ€™re huge jap tasty oysters. Asahi pint goes for 1-1 at 16 dollars. For yakitori we had the chicken skin, chicjen tail, pork belly, pork with enoki, chicken wings and liver. They served all the stiicks at once but would be better if they did it by sticks to maintain the food warm. The pork trotters is also a must try for that collagen boost. Overall good!

Its always a good experience and atmosphere to be dinning at Chijmes . Beautiful places. Foods were good and of course the beer choices to offer was great. Had always enjoyed the visit.  Friendly staffs and always enjoyed their company.

Ordered the premium yakitori, it tasted awful. Food was lukewarm by the time it was served, food had a lot of nerves and was very swallow and couldn't swallow even for the premium meats. Atmosphere was quite disturbing.
